files.patch:
@@ -92,11 +92,6 @@
             <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>
         </dependency>
 
-        <dependency>
-            <groupId>xerces</groupId>
-            <artifactId>xercesImpl</artifactId>
-        </dependency>
-
         <!-- TEST -->
         <dependency>
             <groupId>junit</groupId>

@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@
         <appender-ref ref="main"/>
     </logger>
 
-    <logger name="org.syncope.core.test" additivity="false">
+    <logger name="org.syncope.core.persistence.test" additivity="false">
         <level value="INFO"/>
         <appender-ref ref="test"/>
     </logger>

@@ -6,14 +6,21 @@
        xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd
+       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
+       http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd
+       http://www.springframework.org/schema/p
+       http://www.springframework.org/schema/p/spring-p.xsd
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx.xsd">
 
+    <context:annotation-config/>
+    <context:component-scan base-package="org.syncope.core.persistence.dao.impl"/>
+
     <bean id="propertyConfigurer"
           class="org.springframework.beans.factory.config.PropertyPlaceholderConfigurer">
         <property name="locations">
             <list>
-                <value>classpath:org/syncope/core/db.properties</value>
+                <value>classpath:org/syncope/core/persistence/db.properties</value>
             </list>
         </property>
     </bean>
@@ -58,25 +65,4 @@
         <property name="entityManagerFactory" ref="entityManagerFactory"/>
     </bean>
 
-    <!-- DAOs -->

-          class="org.syncope.core.dao.impl.SyncopeUserDAOImpl">
-        <property name="entityManager" ref="entityManager"/>
-    </bean>
-    <bean id="userAttributeSchemaDAO"

-        <property name="entityManager" ref="entityManager"/>
-    </bean>
-    <bean id="userAttributeDAO"
-          class="org.syncope.core.dao.impl.UserAttributeDAOImpl">
-        <property name="entityManager" ref="entityManager"/>
-    </bean>
-    <bean id="userDerivedAttributeSchemaDAO"
-          class="org.syncope.core.dao.impl.UserDerivedAttributeSchemaDAOImpl">
-        <property name="entityManager" ref="entityManager"/>
-    </bean>
-    <bean id="userDerivedAttributeDAO"

-        <property name="entityManager" ref="entityManager"/>
-    </bean>
 </beans>
